translated: Elder’s Birth Stories🔽The Chapter with Kuṭaja Flower Birth Stories
The Elder Who Attended to the Bodhi Tree
I was devoted to constant attendance,
and I went to the supreme Bodhi Tree.
Having attended to it in the morning and evening,
and being urged by a dry root,
For one hundred and eighteen eons,
I did not fall into the lower realms.
from here I was a lord of the people,

original: kataṁ buddhassa sāsanaṁ”.🔽Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā bodhiupaṭṭhāko thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: katam buddhassa sāsana  ittham sudam āyasmā bodhiupaṭṭhāko thero imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
translated: The Buddha’s instruction has been fulfilled.”🔽Thus did the Elder Bodhiupaṭṭhāka recite these verses, it is said.
The Elder Who Attended to the Bodhi Tree’s Birth Story is the sixth.
